title: Ticket #7467: Fix off-by-one error in instance ID column width in some annex outputs
description: Some of the output formats used by various different annex commands are one character too narrow to display with whole instance ID, and are truncating.
remarks:
2020-Feb-04 16:06:18 by tlmiller:
I think the fix to this went in as 5dc7bcd4e17ad5d3cc5bb53255bd9d35ca2b2250 (in 8.9.4) and I was just using an old version.
creator: tlmiller
